name: Meteors! (platothethird)
description:
This is a personal project I've been working on in my spare time. All spritework, design, and programming was done by me. Any resemblance to any video games made in 1979 is purely coincidental.

Pilot your new ZX-20 SpaceWing™ Remote-Controlled Blastotron into your local asteroid meteor belt and shoot some oversized space rocks into dust!

Rack up points! Gloat to your friends! Avoid doing chores!
